sermons.title: (1 John #16) Undergirding the Faith of the God-Fearing
Fear God
sermons.description: Eli Brayley speaks on fearing God how it is a very crucial foundation to the Scriptures and knowing God. He shares various bible verses from all over the Bible and gives a proper foundation for the topic. He ends to share that in the grace of God and knowing the Lord we have reverence and fear of God but are fully accepted of Him in His Son.
